illnesses.name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
des: Omega-3 fatty acids in the diet

illnesses.name: Dry Eye Syndrome
des: Omega-3 fatty acids in the diet

illnesses.name: Cataracts
des: Typically starts affecting vision after age 60

illnesses.name: Macular Degeneration
cause: Combination of genetic and environmental factors
des: No way to reverse dry macular degeneration
Early diagnosis allows for steps to slow its progression (vitamin supplements, healthy diet, not smoking

illnesses.name: Astigmatism
symptoms: difficulty seeing clearly in low light
cause: Cornea or lens with a different shape than normal
Refractive error due to light bending differently
des: Laser surgery can fully correct astigmatism, reducing or eliminating the need for prescription lenses

illnesses.name: Nystagmus
cause: Usually results from diseases affecting inner ear balance mechanisms or the brain (brainstem or cerebellum
des: Glasses, contact lenses, or rarely, surgery

illnesses.name: Amblyopia (Lazy Eye)
des: Should begin as soon as possible, ideally before age 7
Effective treatment even beyond age 7, but earlier treatment is better
Consult a doctor for treatment options

illnesses.name: Blepharitis
cause: Blocked oil gland on the eyelid
des: Softening crusts with a warm compress
Cleaning the lid with dilute baby shampoo (2-4 times daily)

illnesses.name: Keratitis
symptoms: feeling like there's something in the eye
cause: Noninfectious keratitis (minor injuries, foreign body in the eyes

illnesses.name: Uveitis
cause: Infection, injury, autoimmune, or inflammatory disease
des: Can cause permanent sight loss without treatment
Early diagnosis and treatment are essential to prevent vision impairment
